extendedInfo.description: Talkadroid is the one-of-a-kind, user-friendly Text to Speech application that will make your phone speak aloud anything you give to it.IMPORTANT! Your device not speaking sometimes will happen on tablets and custom ROM builds for the different phones because Android cannot find the TTS data. If this happens you need to install the data manually. Here's the link for it.http://areacellphone.com/download/Free_Android_app/PicoLangInstaller.apkIncluded in "Talkadroid Lite"â¢ Create your own custom ringtones and alarmsâ¢ Download and use 35+ Premium SVOX voicesâ¢ Mess with your friends!â¢ Email someone an audio letterâ¢ Save and load your favorite phrases on the flyâ¢ Includes a built-in soundboard for those with speaking difficulties to carry on quick conversationsâ¢ Everything you could ever want in a Text to Speech app, and then some!Upgrade to the Full Version of Talkadroid and get even more features!*** Go to Menu -> 'Get More Voices' to Preview the 35+ new voices available by SVOX!NOTE: If you already purchased any SVOX voices in Talkadroid Lite or anywhere else, they will automatically show up in Talkadroid.Keywords & Meta:Text to Speech, Talkadroid, Talka Droid, Type to Speak, Type and Say, Custom Ringtones, Ringtone Maker, TTS, Soundboard, ACLS, Speech Difficulties, Type to Talk, talkdroid, text to speach, txt

reviews.comment: Nice interface. Does what g-translate does but far less. Using share to send it text would\'ve been killer, but doesn\'t work. Not a share option.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is the only app my non-verbal son will use. Great app for those that need help with communication, that can read and write really good.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The best
reviews.comment: This is amazing, the best app that helps to read, and you can use it for translate and different languages!!!!! This is excellent!!! better yet!!!! It\'s free!!!
reviews.author: Mario Juarez

reviews.title: Only partially works
reviews.comment: Only about 1% of the time does it use the custom voice I have installed and set as default usually it just usues its own crappy default voice
reviews.author: Brandon Pietsch

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I have lost my voice. This was great .....especially for free. I\'m buying the other version just to get the other voices.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love this app. I can make my voice as V FOR VADETTA. WE ARE ANONYMOUS, WE ARE A LEGION. WE DO NOT FORGIVE. WE DO NOT FORGET. EXPECT US.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love this app, so funny for prank calls, best fun/joke app I have ever downloaded!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Sounds better/smoother if you download the free Ivona voices then use these instead of the default voice.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This app is the best TTS app for Android, but please add the new Apacela voices; they\'re the world\'s highest quality TTS voices.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Its ok voice is sooo boring and should get more voices for free!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I absolutely love this app!!! Except when I open it sometimes randomly it says which app to use, plz stop that.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: I originally got this for. recreational purposes. Then I got sick and have almost lost my voice... It\'s very useful for that purpose. It is what I would expect out of a lite version
reviews.author: Valerie W

reviews.title: ALS -bigger buttons
reviews.comment: I\'m looking at this for a friend who has ALS.  Can\'t talk, and has limited use of hands.  Looks like this paired with SWYPE is a winner.  Though the buttons need to be larger for those with limited dexterity.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awsome
reviews.comment: Best app ever!!!Funny to.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it but...
reviews.comment: I wish you could send talking text messages to others with the app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: I had surgery & wasn\'t able to talk for several weeks.  This app helped me so much and I love that you could save your phrases.
reviews.author: Melissa Verno

reviews.comment: A Flashy, bulked up UI for a basic TTS App. Pitch is a nice feature yet Apps like these have been around for Years! Allow More TALK, VOICES, for FREE.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useful
reviews.comment: I plan on using this to talk when I have surgery on my jaw.  I like how the icon is clearly a parody of Stephen Hawking\'s visage, yet some people still don\'t understand that this app is for assisting with speaking disabilities, not for the blind.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: LOVE IT
reviews.comment: I used it when I lost my voice, it was super easy to use. Best text to speech app out there for free.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Uninstalled it... Reads words out loud but only if you type them in-not text messages...
reviews.author: A Google User
